contents.content: Single page portfolio website created using the Meteor Javascript framrwork. Fully respsonsive to different device parameters, such as screen size and pixel density.

points.content: Developed using the Meteor Javascript framework.
One project, fully respsonsive to work with multiple devices.
Created a fast slider plugin.

contents.content: Single page Meteor JS based website for promoting the bands music.

points.content: Developed using the Meteor Javascript framework.
Connects to several content providers and updates itself automatically.
Server side rendering to make this site readable to crawlers and bots.

contents.content: Single page javascript web application for user second-screen viewing experience.
This app features content recommendation for users, a real-time TV Guide and participation in live events.

points.content: Developed using the Javascript Meteor framework.
Makes use of font icons to render smoothly on all screen sizes.
Fully reactive app which updates itself in realtime.

contents.content: Company landing page for the Berlin based startup TunedIn.

points.content: Developed using a framework which generates static HTML files, concatenates and minifies JS and CSS.
Using the LESS CSS framework, this site is easily optimised to run on tablet and mobile devices.

contents.content: NewsWhip have devised a system to deliver news stories to users based on their popularity.
Using their existing feed infrastructure, I was able to create a cross platform app using html5 and javascript.

points.content: Developed cross platform for easier portability to other devices.
Makes use of most existing infrastructure to minimise back end development effort.
Content cached to minimise impact on server infrastructure and device bandwidth.

contents.content: Overhauled version of the Irish Times news app for iOS and Android devices.
App built natively for iOS and Android phones - plugging into existing infrastructure with solid performance and stability.

points.content: Developed natively in Objective C and Java.
Downloads and caches content concurrently to ensure smooth user interface.
Used a web based beta testing and crash reporting tool to pinpoint problems.
